description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Celeriac Chowder recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Creamy Celeriac Chowder Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat. Use a stick blender to purée (or transfer mixture to a food processor and process until smooth). Add cream and corn, reserving some for garnish, and return to medium heat to simmer for 5 minutes. Ladle into bowls and garnish with reserved corn and chives. Serve with parmesan grissini.
